stable.changelog:
- Fix gif frezzes in player
- Fix transfer low speed
- Fix some translations

beta.changelog:
- Added support for Monet Theme Engine (Android 12 only)
- Update color themes palette
- Reworked about menu with links to contributors and developer
- Added QuickPic in image category (useful for systems that define a default gallery)
- Some optimizations, cleanup and adaptations
